item.title: Testing
item.description: Testing automation There are several testing capabilities for Dynamics AX Dynamics 365 for Finance and Operations (D365FO). It is import to understand the value of automate testing and where to use which tool/technique. In a implementation you can have 2 possible scenarios to be tested: 1. A process implemented without any customization 2. A X++ extension to add functionality on your solution You can’t avoid, at some point you will have to test your solution.
